subSubSection.paragraph:
Lasiocampa (Epicnaptera) Glasunowi Grum-Grzhimailo, 1895
, Hor. Ent. Ross. 29 : 293 . TL: In Persia septent. prope Teheran [nord-Persien, Demavend, log. Schah]. Holotype : male ( ZISP ).

Epicnaptera albofasciata
B.-H. f. capreata Brandt, 1939 , Ent. Rundschau 56 : 23–24 . TL: Iran , Fort Sine-Sefid and village de Comee et montagne Barm-i-Firus ( 2600–3750 m ), region du Kuh-i-Dinar, sur la route Ardekan-Talochosroe.
References : Lajonquiére 1963 : 68–70 , pl. 1 , fig. 16 ; Barou 1967 : 54 ; Modarres Awal 1994 & 1997 : 209 .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution (Map 33 ): eastern Turkey , Transcausasus ( Armenia ). - In Iran : Tehran, Qazvin, Ardebil, W Azerbaijan , Golestan, Mazandaran, Guilan, Kordestan, Markazi, Lorestan, Esfahan, Fars , Bushehr, Kohkiluyeh va Boyerahmad, Hamedan. Zanjan, Gilan and Kordestan provinces.
